newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT- 2 Brokers up Read-Rite EPS.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT- 2 Brokers up Read-Rite EPS.

text.p: -- Goldman Sachs upgraded Read-Rite Corp to market outperform from perform and boosted its 1997 earnings estimate, while PaineWebber boosted its 1997 and 1998 estimates, sources at the two brokerages said.
-- PaineWebber reiterated its buy rating and raised its 1997 earnings outlook to $1.95 per share from $1.35 and 1998 estimate to $3.20 per share from $2.93, a PaineWebber source said.
-- Goldman boosted its 1997 estimate to $1.76 from $1.26 per share and introduced a 1998 estimate of $3, a Goldman source said.
-- Read-Rite stock was up two to 31-5/8 at mid-morning Thursday.
